description: In wlan_hdd_cfg80211_set_privacy_ibss() in Android releases from CAF using the linux kernel (Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android) before security patch level 2018-06-05, a buffer over-read can potentially occur.

product.name: Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel
